source_description:
Add bandcamp subcommand. The goal is to help with bandcamp releases from the user collection.
- Support multiple purchases and discography downloads
- Check if the release is found in the collection
  - support fuzzy search in the cache
  - tags might not match 100%
- Allows to download the release in the format requested
- Add support for the session cookie extraction
- Add support for generating a report page (html) that includes direct links to the download of bandcamp in the desired format
- Goal is to have a semi-automatic repair mechanism when "files check" detected a broken bandcamp file to redownload and replace the file
see:
https://github.com/RustyRin/bandcamp-api/
https://github.com/Evolution0/bandcamp-dl
